description:
The 'Whimsical' pizza. A sophisticated harmony of savory ham and earthy vegetables, offering a different flavor profile in every bite.

Ingredients: San Marzano Tomato Base, Mozzarella, Cooked Ham, Sliced Mushrooms, Artichoke Hearts, Black Olives, Extra Virgin Olive Oil.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy.

True to its name, this 'Devilish' pizza brings the heat with premium spicy salami and a kick of crushed red pepper flakes.

Ingredients: Tomato Sauce, Mozzarella di Bufala, Spicy Ventricina Salami, Fresh Chili Peppers, Oregano.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy.

A crowd favorite. Crispy, curled pepperoni slices layered over a sea of melted mozzarella and our signature tangy tomato sauce.

Ingredients: Sourdough Crust, Tomato Sauce, Mozzarella, Premium Beef Pepperoni, Garlic Oil.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy.

The gold standard of Naples. Simplicity at its finest, featuring the colors of the Italian flag: red tomato, white mozzarella, and green basil.

Ingredients: San Marzano Tomatoes, Fresh Mozzarella, Fresh Basil Leaves, Sea Salt, Extra Virgin Olive Oil.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy.

A velvety, rich masterpiece for cheese lovers. A complex blend of four distinct cheeses that melt together into a creamy delight.

Ingredients: Mozzarella, Gorgonzola Dolce, Shaved Parmesan, Fontina Cheese, Toasted Walnuts (optional).

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Nuts.

Representing the Four Seasons. Each quadrant of the pizza offers a unique topping, traditionally divided to showcase varied seasonal flavors.

Ingredients: Tomato Base, Mozzarella, Mushrooms (Spring), Artichokes (Summer), Olives (Autumn), Prosciutto (Winter).

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy.

A modern classic. Juicy grilled chicken strips paired with sweet red onions and a blanket of golden mozzarella.

Ingredients: Herb-Roasted Chicken, Red Onion, Bell Peppers, Mozzarella, Tomato Sauce, Fresh Parsley.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy.
